title: Combinatorics Functions - AssemblyScript
description: Convert combinatorics functions from JavaScript to AssemblyScript in src/wasm/combinatorics/. These are factorial, permutation, and combination operations with Very High WASM priority.

tasks.description: Convert src/function/combinatorics/bellNumbers.js to src/wasm/combinatorics/bellNumbers.ts - Bell numbers calculation
Convert src/function/combinatorics/catalan.js to src/wasm/combinatorics/catalan.ts - Catalan numbers calculation
Convert src/function/combinatorics/stirlingS2.js to src/wasm/combinatorics/stirlingS2.ts - Stirling numbers of second kind
Convert src/function/combinatorics/composition.js to src/wasm/combinatorics/composition.ts - Integer composition calculation

acceptanceCriteria: All 4 combinatorics functions converted to AssemblyScript
Unit tests pass with correct results
